entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3 except plus 1 along the coast. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 3 except plus 1 along the coast. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High 12 except plus 5 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 12 except plus 5 along parts of the coast. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 6 except plus 2 along the coast.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 6 except plus 2 along the coast. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 10 May 2023
